summary:
Harry Potter 30-Day Challenge
Day 8: Favorite chapter from your favorite book. 
Chapter 31. The Battle of Hogwarts
I don't know...
body:
Harry Potter 30-Day Challenge

Day 8: Favorite chapter from your favorite book.

Chapter 31. The Battle of Hogwarts

I don’t know why, but Hogwarts being destroyed in this chapter became my favorite. I cried when the protecting charm of the professors shattered, it was like ruining my childhood home.

reblog.comment:
Harry Potter 30-Day Challenge

Day 8: Favorite chapter from your favorite book.

Chapter 31. The Battle of Hogwarts

I don’t know why, but Hogwarts being destroyed in this chapter became my favorite. I cried when the protecting charm of the professors shattered, it was like ruining my childhood home.

Harry Potter 30-Day Challenge

Day 8: Favorite chapter from your favorite book.

Chapter 31. The Battle of Hogwarts

I don’t know why, but Hogwarts being destroyed in this chapter became my favorite. I cried when the protecting charm of the professors shattered, it was like ruining my childhood home.
trail.content:
Harry Potter 30-Day Challenge

Day 8: Favorite chapter from your favorite book.

Chapter 31. The Battle of Hogwarts

I don’t know why, but Hogwarts being destroyed in this chapter became my favorite. I cried when the protecting charm of the professors shattered, it was like ruining my childhood home.

Fight me. | Feel free to ask anything. |

summary: Warner Bros signs GWCC for ‘Harry Potter’ apparel, merchandises
title: Warner Bros signs GWCC for ‘Harry Potter’ apparel, merchandises
body:
Warner Bros signs GWCC for ‘Harry Potter’ apparel, merchandises

Warner Bros. Consumer Products has partnered GWCC to deliver a collection of ‘The Wizarding World of Harry Potter’ apparel, luggage and wearable accessories, according to a report in the Licensing Biz.

The products will be inspired by the Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts movies.

(Image Courtesy: Licensing Biz)

The assortment will include clothing for kids and adults as well as waxed canvas…

View On WordPress

summary: imagine, the marauders sitting around a fire in the afterlife, wearing cozy sweaters and drinking tea from cups that...
body:
imagine, the marauders sitting around a fire in the afterlife, wearing cozy sweaters and drinking tea from cups that automatically refill, just bummed out.

“my ideas all only work well if there are four of us.” remus sighs, setting down the cup. he has notebooks full of these prank plans, none of them properly fit for just three.

“why did peter have to turn out to be such a spineless, traitorous twat?” sirius complains, flicking his hair out of his face.

“a literal rat bastard.” james mumbles before he takes a sip of the tea.

suddenly, a door, that seemingly was placed there for this specific dramatic effect, kicks opens. standing there, holding a box of never ending supplies of all the best weasley’s wizarding wheezes items and being very ginger, fred grins at the men. “gimme a weird nickname, turn me into an animal, and make me your fourth gentlemen, it’s fredd-aye!”

some afterlife admin is gonna start regretting letting them all in pretty soon.

body:
rewards from classes

I watched a tutorial on youtube about rewards from classes. So, whenever you get a star, you get 3 different rewards to choose from. After you finish the star, your game automatically saves it’s progress. If you now close the app before choosing one of the rewards (not just put it on stand by, instead close the app) you can choose from 3 different rewards, because they are always chosen randomly. This is really helpful especially when you look for particular attributes/skill points (courage, empathy, knowledge).

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

title: Shatter
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2J2zt4F

by Parralilium

It’s Hogwarts Eighth and Annette Sotiras is back after the defeat of He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. Unfortunately, Hogwarts isn’t the same as it use to be. Secrets are everywhere and no one is prepared to share them. With one year left for the legendary Sotiras and her team of misfits, what secrets will be revealed and what will come of the friendships once strong as concrete?

Words: 104, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Original Characters, Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger, Blaise Zabini, Pansy Parkinson, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Remus Lupin, Sirius Black
  • Relationships: Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter, Pansy Parkinson/Reader, Draco Malfoy/Reader, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: First Kiss, Fluff and Angst, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Multiple Relationships, POV First Person, Swearing, Hogwarts Eighth Year, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Post-War, Flashbacks, Sirius Black Lives, Remus Lupin Lives


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2J2zt4F
